reasoning_log: The matching process prioritized unique visual features (e.g., specific furniture, tiling, or window placement) to resolve ambiguities among similar room types. For the Living/Dining areas, descriptions were matched based on the specific perspective (e.g., focusing on the long layout in Image_3 vs. the dining area in Image_2/16). In the Master Bedrooms, Desc_10 ('收納到位') and Desc_11 ('家具配置完整') were assigned to the rooms featuring the large, dark wood wardrobe/desk unit (Image_10, Image_12). Image_13 (a view of the simpler master bedroom) and Image_11 (a narrow kitchen) were identified as the two redundant images, as all 14 descriptions were successfully mapped to the remaining 14 unique visual spaces. The three bathroom descriptions were matched to the three distinct bathroom images (Image_9 for light tiles, Image_7 and Image_14 for the two views of the dark-tiled, spacious bathrooms).

matching_result_list.evidence: Living room view showing the sofa, TV wall with storage ('牆面收納'), and balcony access ('採光佳', '通風良好').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 公領域開闊(客廳座位區視野延伸至餐廳), 採光集中前端(靠窗區較亮中段偏暗), 規劃明確(電視牆與沙發對稱配置), 收納櫃體齊全(電視櫃與側櫃提供大量收納), 家具附贈(沙發與茶几可直接使用), 地板易保養(大面積拋光磚)

matching_result_list.evidence: Wide shot of the combined L/D area ('大坪數公領域') showing the dining table in the foreground and the living room extending back, confirming '用餐區預留'.

extracted_feature.raw_description: 大面積開放空間(適合家庭活動與招待客人), 採光由一側引入(需靠燈具補足中後段亮度), 餐廳位置固定(靠牆桌椅不影響動線), 照明充足(多組天花燈具), 佈局彈性(可再增設書房角或兒童遊戲區), 進出動線順暢(大門至陽台一路筆直無阻礙)

matching_result_list.evidence: Clear view of the long, narrow layout ('長形規劃') looking toward the entrance, with light primarily from the far end ('採光單面') and a visible '收納牆面'.

matching_result_list.evidence: Independent kitchen with a large glass door/window structure, strongly supporting '採光通風佳' and '可規劃後陽台'. Features open shelving ('櫥櫃收納多').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光通風佳(雙扇窗與對外門), 獨立廚房(與客廳分開油煙不易外溢), 完整爐具(瓦斯爐與抽油煙機齊全), 櫥櫃收納多(上下櫃與開放層架), 易清潔磁磚(牆地面全磁磚防油汙), 可規劃後陽台(落地門外疑似晾衣空間)

matching_result_list.evidence: Unfurnished, square secondary bedroom ('規矩房型') with dual windows (large and small) providing excellent light ('採光良好').

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光良好(一大一小窗戶), 通風條件佳(雙向開窗有利對流), 規矩房型(近方正好擺雙人床與衣櫃), 地板耐用易打理(拋光磚), 預留收納空間(牆面空白可做衣櫃書桌)

extracted_feature.raw_description: 採光佳(轉角大窗), 通風良好(至少兩扇可開窗), 房型方正(好規劃床位與衣櫃動線), 隱私尚可(窗外對街景需搭配窗簾), 牆面留白(方便後續加設櫃體或裝飾)
